text: Paranoia is an American drama thriller movie directed by Robert Luketic. The screenplay was written by Barry L. Levy and Jason Dean Hall, based on the 2004 novel of the same name by Joseph Finder. It stars Liam Hemsworth, Gary Oldman, Harrison Ford, Amber Heard and Josh Holloway. It was released on August 16, 2013. ==References== Category:2013 drama thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:FBI in fiction Category:Movies based on books
title: Paranoia (2013 movie)
